    • createDepositBankAccount

      public DepositBankAccount createDepositBankAccount(@NonNull @NonNull UUID clientId, @NonNull @NonNull BigDecimal money, int daysNumber)
      Method to create new DepositBankAccount to the client with id clientId.
      Parameters:
      clientId - the id of the client who create DepositBankAccount.
      money - the sum of money to create DepositBankAccount.
      daysNumber - the number of days for which DepositBankAccount opens.
      Returns:
      new instance of DepositBankAccount.
      Throws:
      BankException - if the sum of money is less than 0 or if days to open are less than 1 or if relevant rate was not found.
